storyInfo: As the dust settles, the Blood Knight collapses into the Radiant Knight's arms. When the moment of victory comes to pass, the entirety of the Grand Knight Territory's forces begin carrying out their own plans. The Radiant Knight resolves to share the podium of glory with the Blood Knight, and this will surely usher in great trials.

attributes.content: ...'Fear neither hardship nor darkness.'
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: These excellent saplings... must take root and grow in this poisonous land.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Perhaps we made the wrong decision after all, Nearl...
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Grandmaster...
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: The General Chamber was unable to figure out our objective.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Naturally... They must've assumed that we came here to topple them, opportunistically, to consolidate the power of the Adeptus.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: And of course, they'd be correct. The Adeptus Sprawiedliwi has taken over the supervision of Area 0, and the General Chamber must be made to pay.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: But the businessmen will never understand... just how far we're willing to go for the sake of that girl, Margaret.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: 'Fear neither hardship nor darkness.' That has long been the motto of the Nearl family.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: But these words have also been inscribed on the swords, spears, and shields of the nearly thirty members of the Silverlance Pegasus Knightclub.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: During that war, in the midst of that hopeless battle, mired in that pitch-black swamp, Kirill Nearl vowed to save every last besieged knight.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: They were without supplies, their communications cut off. The combined army's artillery division and tactical unit were searching for them.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Nearl only convinced seven knights to take part in the rescue operation. Before they set off, each of them engraved those words on their shields: 'Fear neither hardship nor darkness.'
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Seven knights set out, but forty-one returned.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: But, of the original seven knights, only Kirill and I remained.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: But the two of you saved over thirty comrades.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: And also... brought back everyone's shields.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: 'Fear neither hardship nor darkness.' After that night, all forty-one inscribed those words. On their swords, their armor, their staves, their shields.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: After that, we broke through on the east.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: And when you regrouped with the knightclub again, only seven knights were left once more.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Just as heaven willed.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: But three thousand enemies were wiped out, and the shields of those forty-six knights, all bearing the coats of arms of their respective families, were returned to Kazimierz. Not a single one was left behind.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Daybreak over the Golden Prairie. Every single campaign knight knows this battle well, Grandmaster.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: We salute you!
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: The Armorless Union wants to harm the children of the Nearl family?
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Hah. I wonder if they have enough forces in their reserves.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: ––What an explosion! The Arts wrapped around our two competitors came into contact, causing a huge blast!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The first to appear from the smoke–– is the Blood Knight! The Blood Knight's been repelled! He's holding his axe in his other hand now–– not his dominant hand! Did his arm go numb from the impact?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: On the other side–– Margaret's supporting herself using her strange swordspear! Without a doubt, the Blood Knight came out on top in this last exchange––
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Kuh...!
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: ––The Blood Knight is charging again! Does the Radiant Knight have time to react?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What...?!
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Too bad, but I'm one step ahead of you.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Your movements... There's no way skills like that could've been tempered in this playground.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Who did you fight for during your time in exile? When facing an attack, your first instinct is not to evade and counterattack, but to withstand the blow.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: A knight's duty is to defend, even if it means giving her life.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Is it now?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: You are not the type to speak lightly of life and death. Show me then, just what life and death mean to you!
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: What a dazzling display of close-quarters combat––! After the Radiant Knight repelled the onslaught, the two seem to locked in a never-ending melee–– Wait, it's not that simple!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: ––A huge pool of blood is appearing beneath the two combatants' feet! It's the Blood Knight's trap!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: (Minoan) Ashes to ashes, dust to dust. Exsanguination, to me.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: The pool of blood seems to congeal into sticky silk strands, tangling themselves around Margaret's limbs.
The blood flowing through the pegasus's body resonates with its compatriot, causing a tingling pain.
––As if I'd let you!
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: What?! You severed the resonance with your Arts...?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: –––Hraagh!
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: What a turn of events!! The Blood Knight was trying to control the Radiant Knight using his Arts, but was unexpectedly rebuked! With a hack and smash of the Radiant Knight's swordspear, her opponent has fallen to the ground!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This is the first time in the Major that the Blood Knight has been forced to his knees! I'm sure everyone heard that thunderous impact! Just how much damage did our defending champion take?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: You should have been able to easily take a blow like that.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The Blood Knight rises to his feet wordlessly and once again brandishes his massive axe, swinging it straight at his opponent's head.
(It's a sweeping strike–– but his swing is too erratic!)
attributes.name: The Radiant Knight

attributes.content: A jolt of pain wracks his entire body, forcing the Blood Knight's axe to shift downward slightly.
Urgh—
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: What... incredible strength...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: To him, this pain is both foreign and familiar.
It is unlike being burnt, cut, or frostburned. It is unlike any pain he has ever felt in the arena.
This pain comes from the depths of his body.
His disease.
A tipping point.
That last blow of yours... hit me hard.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: How do you like this then?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Blood glistens and condenses into an amorphous ball of light.
Margaret has no time to weigh her options. She has to interrupt his Arts.
A glowing aura emerges from behind her.
This light, given form, is strong enough to melt all suffering.
Go get 'er, Blood Knight!
attributes.name: A Spectator A

attributes.content: Stay away from him! Finish him off with your Arts, Margaret!
attributes.name: A Spectator B

attributes.content: Knights really are popular, aren't they?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Everyone is in position.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: My dear Monique, would you imagine how nice it would've been if we never formed the Armorless Union, but instead became knights?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: How are things for Platinum?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I almost feel bad for her.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: ...Hmm.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: The Armorless Union... is just you bunch?
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Laugh all you want. Not like I can see your expression under that helmet anyway.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: 'Silverlance Pegasus,' huh. Are a few Armorless not good enough for you to sink your teeth into?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The leaders of the Union, and thirty of our members. And you only sent seven.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Are you saying that we don't stand a chance against just seven of you?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Three of us will suffice.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: It's a spear of light! Wait, no, that's the Blood Knight's axe–– it's covered with an aura of blood! But, the Radiant Knight dodged–– Wait, it's a feint! The Radiant Knight's swordspear–– Whew...
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: I... I have no words to describe what's going on right now! I've never seen such fierce fighting! I'm afraid even an instant replay wouldn't clear it up for us––
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Jealous, Tytus?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: The Blood Knight... is very powerful.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I thought... there weren't any Infected who could have such a commanding presence...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I never thought this city could cultivate an iron will like that.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Nearl always told me Kazimierz had forgotten the meaning of glory.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: This city always gave me that impression. Grandstanding, superficial. Mired in an unfathomable depth of consumerism and commercialism.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: But the people living in this city, every person still fighting to survive... They are all driven on by the conviction in their hearts.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Nearl was right. That glory, those virtues... will never be forgotten.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Margaret––!
Huh? Isn't that...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Margaret––! You can do it!!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: This is no ordinary match. Don't you think our cheering is a bit too ordinary?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: It's the thought that counts. Not like Margaret can hear us with how big the crowd is.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Why don't we keep our eyes peeled for the Armorless Union instead? Even if the old bigwigs of the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi let us come, who knows if the Union is still hiding out there?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Margaret––!! Take him down!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Margaret––!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The audience's cheers were always only meant for their own ears.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Even if Margaret can't hear them, as long as she remembers that people are supporting her, she will not fall.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Does that mean she's...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A Nearl... Margaret's little sister, Maria.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Just as Margaret said, everyone eventually came together, right?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.text: The aura of light grows stronger while the sheen of blood revels in chaos.
The two continue to clash without a single word.

attributes.content: (Is the referee still keeping score? No? O-Okay then...)
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Radiant Knight!
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Hraaagh––!!
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Splendid! You're the only one who could withstand this attack head-on!
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Likewise... What kind of power is this...
attributes.name: The Radiant Knight

attributes.content: The Blood Knight stands firm and lifts his axe.
Once the Blood Arts enveloping his weapon fades, the once-adamantine Minoan axe crumbles like dust.
Only half of the Radiant Knight's swordspear remains. Its shattered blade punctured the Blood Knight's helmet, revealing his determination-filled eyes.
Margaret's swordspear broke?! I went through so much effort to reinforce it!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The Blood Knight's strength is beyond doubt... but he's also lost his weapon!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Now both of them... are unarmed...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Marvelous...
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: This is the first time... I've ever felt that the knight competitions... could bring real joy.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I recall my hometown. Those white buildings surrounding that pristine, blue lake.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: At the end of the road was a row of blue fences, with a pot of jasmine flowers placed there.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: The rusty smell of blood.
The flowing heat of blood.
The raw determination of blood.
Minos is a beautiful place, Blood Knight.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Many knights fight for wealth. Some, for fame.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: But we, the Infected, only fight for survival.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Every match I win, I live a day longer. Another day to spend in the dumps. It's not easy.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: What about you, Radiant Knight?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: You are much stronger than I imagined... What have you been through?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Oh! Nearl is looking over at us?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It seems so.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You can do this, Nearl!
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Margaret! You've got this––!!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Margaret, you'd better not lose! I swear, if you end up losing––!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Hahaha, it doesn't matter, as long as they have a good rumble.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: You bet. It's been so long since I've seen anyone like that Margaret. It's making my hands itchy, old timer.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: (Smiles silently) ......
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...Tragedy.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I've seen an entire city crumble beneath a Catastrophe. The Infected, slaughtering innocent civilians, stacking their bodies high and burning them as a warning.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I've seen bounty hunters torment the poor and downtrodden for sport, parents selling their young children for uncontaminated food and water.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I've seen unimaginable tragedy I could never imagine in Kazimierz. However, I also met a group of people... clawing their way forward through that suffering.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I am not alone, Blood Knight.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: And yet, after seeing all that, you still chose to come back to Kazimierz, to reclaim your narrow-minded ideals?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Then, you are no longer narrow-minded.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: This is my last strike, Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Come. Let's settle this without any further delay. Thinking about anything else... is a right reserved only for the victor!
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Blood Knight Dikaiopolis, you truly are a great knight.
attributes.name: The Radiant Knight

attributes.content: And determining which of is the victor... shall bring glory to all of Kazimierz.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: My name is Margaret Nearl! My family motto is, 'Fear neither hardship nor darkness!'
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: (Minoan) From this day forth, I am no longer alone!
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: So, will the Blood Knight win, and make things easy for everyone... or will the Radiant Knight win, and we get our hands dirty?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Excuse me, is anyone sitting here?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Never thought I'd get to watch the finals on a big screen from the side of the street. What a metropolitan life, hmm?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: ...Absolutely dazzling.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Margaret shines even brighter than before. Losing her would be a huge blow to the Silverlances.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: But when you look at her like this... she really is a rebel after all.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Teams 3 and 4, wait for instructions by the entrance.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Team 5, enter the arena and mark Rhodes Island. Team 6, mark Maria's group.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: The Nearl family has a tendency to produce the most incredible, and the most stubborn people.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Wouldn't you agree, Młynar?
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Always feels to me like... it doesn't matter who wins.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: (Clicks quietly)
attributes.name: Justice Knight

attributes.content: This is a duel between knights.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: The Blood Knight and the Radiant Knight... they are shining paragons.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But, that's not where our battles are. The things we want can't be found there either.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: They opened the way for us... and we must keep fighting.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The two combatants, now without their weapons, are now condensing their Arts to have one last showdown!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What a lengthy struggle! After the light fades, who will be the first to fall?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Some of the knights at the venue stop their hoarse shouting and cheering.
They slowly rise to their feet, silently waiting for the conclusion.
The Blood Knight... is at his limit.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.text: For a moment, it seems as if the entire Grand Knight Territory went silent.
But, a melodious horn from outside the arena breaks the silence.
It soars through the clouds, up beyond the hole-riddled nightscape.

attributes.content: This is a tribute, Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: A hero has risen.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: A thunderous roar.
A symphony of clashing sounds.
Each time weapons collide, sparks burst forth and obscure the fight.
The first to fall will be defeated.
...Nngh!
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: His step falters.
The hero's body has long dried up from his blood-manipulating Arts.
...Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: How long will you remain in Kazimierz? Will you continue... to kindle this land's lighthouse?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: When I returned to my homeland––
attributes.name: The Radiant Knight

attributes.content: ––I already steeled myself, to never run.
attributes.name: The Radiant Knight

attributes.content: ...Good.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Come. We shouldn't leave any regrets behind.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: The Radiant Knight

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: This duel... won't have any meaning.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: ...Salute... Salute the Blood Knight.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: ...Salute! Our hero!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: ...Knight.... Knight...
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: The Blood Knight gazes at the sky.
He can no longer move a muscle.
The sky.
Even if the nomadic city has moved past that lightless night, the Blood Knight still remembers.
He remembers there was never a moment... when the night surrendered to the city.
...It's your win, Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Fresh blood spills onto the ground.
Though unable to maintain the basic structure of his Arts, the Blood Knight still clutches the weapon that looks like it could dissipate at any moment.
No! What are you doing? The winner... should not be propping up the loser...
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: *cough*... There is no loser here, Blood Knight.
attributes.name: The Radiant Knight

attributes.content: W-W-We have a winner!!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The one left standing at the end–– No, more accurately, the Radiant Knight is holding up the Blood Knight! The Blood Knight... can't stand on his own!!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The panel is still tallying up the score, and until now, their scores were neck-and-neck! But, based on what we just saw–– if the Blood Knight is unable to continue fighting, then––
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Then, without a doubt––
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: ––The champion of Kazimierz's 24th Special Knight Tournament... is none other than––
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: ...THE RADIANT KNIGHT! MAAAARGAREEEET NEAAARRRRLLL!!!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: ––Execute the plan.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: The various teams are moving to strike. The special detachment has entered the arena, targeting Maria Nearl and Whislash Knight.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: While the crowd is in chaos––
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: What a deafening roar of applause.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I really do envy the knights' popularity.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: There are some knights who aren't as popular.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: It seems like you have some other reason for saying that?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: The old knight-lords always remain at the very top. Frustrating, isn't it?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: How curious. I wonder what kind of lives you bounty hunters lead to be able to mingle with the knights?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Ursus artillery destroyed our town. We became a pack of hunters in need of prey to survive.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: One rainy night, we hunted a wild mangler until dawn, only to discover that a 'knight' had long snatched up our prey.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Oh, that seems like an interesting story.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: He was a decked-out princeling, all glittering and gold, pretending to use the rain to wash off the blood on his face. So we asked, what would a knight be doing all the way out here.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Wanna guess what he said?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: He said, 'I'm not a knight yet, just a wanderer.' Then he asked us, 'Who were you again?'
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Grr.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Oh my, Monique, when'd you decide to fly in? I thought your part of the operation was quite some distance from here.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: And what's more, you even got hurt.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Cut the crap, Roy. Either call the thing off, or come help me out over here.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Now what kind of wind would be able to blow our own 'wanderer' back here?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Roy the Lazurite is about to get up, but a hand presses down on his shoulder.
A Sarkaz hand.
Heh. 'Wanderer,' huh? At the time, I thought to myself, why the hell are you playing dumb?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: So this is what I said back to him––
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: ––'Standing before you is Kazimierz's strongest bounty hunter.'
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Radiant Knight! Radiant Knight! Radiant Knight!
attributes.name: Cheers

attributes.content: A few months ago, what analyst could've predicted this outcome?! That our champion would be the Radiant Knight, Margaret Nearl, after suddenly and shockingly returning to the arena?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Now, let your cheers fill this arena! The prize pool for today's competition has reached an unbelievable amount!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: It's no exaggeration to say that the Radiant Knight's legendary experience has scored her enough wealth to rival that of an entire corporation!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Even the General Chamber of Commerce will be here today to make a huge announcement to everyone!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: To our wonderful friends in the arena and those watching from home! The Knights Association officially confirmed yesterday that they will hold a champion's press conference tomorrow. But right now, there's a truth we must share with all of you!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Six years ago, the Radiant Knight was exiled by the Knights Association for 'concealing her status as an Infected!' But today, the Radiant Knight's name has finally been cleared!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Her exile was the result of a criminal conspiracy! The scoundrels bought off the Knights Association and forcibly expelled the Radiant Knight from the country on false pretenses!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Yes indeed! Here, as a representative of the Knights Association, the National Council, and the General Chamber of Commerce, I solemnly announce to the entire audience––
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: ––that all accusations against the Radiant Knight are hereby dropped! The Radiant Knight, our great champion, is not an Infected!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I knew this would happen.;I warned Nearl about this.;This is what Margaret meant.

attributes.content: Wait... Doctor, did you purposely...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: 'If you deny your own heart, and conceal the truth from the world, there is no glory to be had.'
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Before Nearl left Rhodes Island, the Doctor told her about the possible consequences.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Even if the K.G.C.C. does not take this as a threat, Nearl... will eventually call upon Rhodes Island to be her notary.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: For the sake of–– Wait, wait...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Why now of all times to come clean? Goddammit, the K.G.C.C. is trying to get the Infected to turn on each other!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: This is bad. They're trying to make it look like the Radiant Knight doesn't represent them, and that their champion lost––
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: ...To make it seem as if... my sister... lied to everyone.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Wh-What's going on? Is Margaret not Infected?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: In order to protect the young and energetic Margaret, Old Nearl purposely had her exiled.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: She was exiled... because of Grandpa?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Even Margaret herself did not know about this. She truly believed she had contracted Oripathy during the competitions, and even came to terms with it.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: But Oripathy is not something that can be hidden forever. After this many years, she must've discovered the truth long ago.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...Margaret...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (Now's our chance. Go, go!)
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Stop right there!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ugh! What–?! What just knocked my dagger––?!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: You worthless–– I'll handle this!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: The Armorless?! Maria, watch out!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Zofia stands her ground in front of Maria.
The Armorless assassin raises the dagger in his hand.
...Despicable cutthroat.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Gah! You did that with just your hilt?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Damn you––!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Innocent people will get hurt here.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I'd prefer you not disturb the peace.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: This one's mine!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Urgh!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Th-Thanks, Shining...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Hey, what's the meaning of this?! The Radiant Knight isn't Infected?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: I... What kind of sick joke? I thought this whole time... she was fighting for the Infected! But all along, she...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Could it be that the Radiant Knight was lying to us?
attributes.name: A Spectating Knight

attributes.content: You've been made a pawn.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: I realized it shortly after leaving Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Oripathy is like a curse, and yet my body... showed no signs of it.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The rest fell into place soon after that. My grandfather had me leave Kazimierz, all for the sake of protecting my rash and impetuous self.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The General Chamber of Commerce will not relent until the 'Radiant Knight' is no longer a thorn in their side.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...*cough* *cough*... *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Here, lean on my shoulder.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Many thanks.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: If not for the worsening of your condition, I well could've been the one to lose this match.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: There's no point saying things like that... Do you think I fought my way here just to use my Oripathy as an excuse?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The Infected will not trust you.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: They are very wise. They did not let you spread your prestige among the masses. They set you up to be the villain.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Do you also think of me that way?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Me? Hah......
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: An Infected who fights for the Infected, or a normal person who fights for the Infected... Which is more noble?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Some people do understand this principle, but, public opinion will ignite their extremism... The days you spend here will not be pleasant.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: It would seem that this news has already caused quite a stir–– Oh my, the panel has come to its final decision: the Radiant Knight's victory is well-deserved––!!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Tonight, Kazimierz will crown a new champion! In two hours, the Radiant Knight, Margaret Nearl, will enter the annals of history at the Wall of Champions!!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: But don't go anywhere, because tomorrow, we'll have our grand closing ceremony! You won't want to miss it!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: ...Dikaiopolis.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: A knight belongs where there is glory to be had.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Of course. If you really wanted to give them a slap across the face, you could just ditch the award ceremony...
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: No, that would just be running away. Same as how I ran from Kazimierz back then.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: So... what's your plan?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: We'll go together.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Hah... Hahaha... Interesting.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: It'd be my honor.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Next, a few words from the host–– Wait, hold on! Something's happening down there!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight is ignoring the host! She... she's helping the Blood Knight up and heading for the arena's exit!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What's the meaning of this?! Does the Radiant Knight plan to share the championship with the Blood Knight?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Damn you... Trying to virtue signal now that your lies are out in the open?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Drop the act already, Radiant Knight! Traitor to the Infected!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: ––that all accusations against the Radiant Knight are hereby dropped! The Radiant Knight, our great champion, is not an Infected!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight... isn't an Infected?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: J-Justyna, are you alright...?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Yeah, I'm just... shocked.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Did the K.G.C.C. make that up?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: It's not difficult to frame a normal person as an Infected, but it is virtually impossible to hide an Infected.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: So, the Radiant Knight isn't an Infected...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Then why... Why has she been fighting for us all this time?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Monique! The Radiant Knight and the Blood Knight have left the arena! Do we go after them?
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: ...Monique? Hello?
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: ––Wh-What's going on? What happened in the arena?
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Grr... They weren't kidding when they said three was enough. Practically snapping my arrows like toothpicks...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: D-Did he seriously cleave that pillar with just a swing of his sword? Those pillars have to be made out of cardboard or something, right?
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Calm down, we're out of our depth here. Let's back up for now and regroup with the main force.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The only weakness of the 'Silverlance Pegasi' is their stubborn adherence to tradition. They won't have any other tricks up their sleeves.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: What?! What's going on?! Someone's attacking the Wall!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: (The Armorless Union?! They would dare to launch an attack when the audience hasn't even left yet?!)
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Everyone, p-please don't panic! Security! Yes, security will make sure you get to safety––!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: ––I thought the knights of the Nearl family were supposed to be all shiny and glowing.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Seriously though, Młynar. Why stick your nose where it doesn't belong? You aren't even a knight, and if you plan to stay in the Grand Knight Territory, you know better than to anger the K.G.C.C.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: ...Ten years.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I worked for ten years, and not once did I ask for a leave over personal matters.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: In other words... Right now, I am legally entitled to three months of vacation.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Gah... Stop scurrying around, you pesky bounty hunter.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Haha, Młynar Nearl on vacation? That's a perverse joke if I've ever heard one.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: ––One more thing, Roy.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Light flashes through the Lazurite's vision.
Like the morning breeze wafting through a forest, it is neither strong nor conspicuous. Almost as if the lake's surface could block it.
But in a heartbeat, Młynar's sword is resting against the Lazurite's neck.
Whether or not we're knights... is not for you to decide.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Haha, then who does get to decide?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Kazimierz has no right to dub me.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Are you still able to walk?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I'm fine... But more importantly, have you thought about what doing this means?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: I'm just reclaiming the title of 'knight' from them.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: L-Look, isn't that the Blood Knight and the Radiant Knight?!
attributes.name: A Tourist

attributes.content: Are they going to walk to the Wall of Champions like that?! Hey, c'mere and take a picture, quick!
attributes.name: A Tourist

attributes.content: What's the situation?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: We can't reach the two Lazurites... The Radiant Knight and Blood Knight are slowly moving towards the Wall of Champions exhibition hall.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Spokesman... The Radiant Knight and the Blood Knight are headed for the Wall of Champions together, and the Board of Directors is very unhappy about this development...
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Have the Armorless stop them. Otherwise, they'll be branded as enemies of the K.G.C.C.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: This is for their own good.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Understood. Oh and a letter for you that came in this morning.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: A letter?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Yes. According to the Messenger, it was signed 'Your Friend.'
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Just leave it over there. I'll see you later.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Hm? All right then...
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}... I'm sorry, but this is all I can do for you.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Forgive me. Forgive me for not even daring to read your letter.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Maybe only after you've left the Grand Knight Territory... will I have the right to respond to it.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Has this road... always been this long?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: You're wounded, so we're walking slower.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Look! Look over there!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Block the road!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Radiant Knight, Blood Knight, there are countless crossbows pointed at you. All we ask... is that you turn back right now.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Those are the orders we got from the K.G.C.C. We do not wish to have to strike down our two champions.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: It seems... that our pilgrimage ends here.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Go. My head has already been bowed in defeat for a long time. I will let them know––
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: An arrow lodges into the ground between the two knights and the Armorless.
Who's there?!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: (Excited clicking noises)
attributes.name: Justice Knight

attributes.content: You're––
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: What are you looking at, Armorless scum?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: ––Enemies! The Infected are attacking! Fiiiiire!!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Your bolts won't reach our champion, Armorless.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Try this on for size!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: The Infected are here!! Call for backup––
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: What?! Our comms are cut off?
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: A perfect shot.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: It's you...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: This would be our second official meeting, right? Our two champions.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: If we find the time, I'd love to get autographs from both of you––
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But for now, keep moving forward. Just follow this road down to the end, right through the city.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: This is the greatest of causes.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Pinus Sylvestris again? Looks like the campaign knights still haven't shown up.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Wandering into a nice, wide-open space like that is just begging to get sniped––
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Don't move.
Let them go, Platinum.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Requesting backup! Requesting backup!
attributes.name: A Voice from the Communicator

attributes.content: Roy, we can't be wasting any more time.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Grrr... Look for a chance to retreat. I'll stop them.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: ...Be careful.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: What'cha mumbling about over there?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Haha... Well, well... hasn't this turned into a pain in the ass.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: We're in position––
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Sona, there's no end to these Armorless goons! We'll be in trouble if this drags on!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Hey, come help us out, you bunch of louts!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Tsk... What a bunch of cowards.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Iwona, behind you!
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Are you okay?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I'm here to help!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: It's Maria Nearl! Get them––!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Keep your hands off her.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Kowal, you ready over there?!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Way ahead of you!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: You should've stayed in your nursing home... Surround them!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: What's going on? Why's my weapon shaking?
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Heehee... I wonder why?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight's actions are a slap across the face to the K.G.C.C.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Is this the rest of the Union? What about the two Sarkaz knights?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: W-We haven't seen them... since the last time they tried to assassinate Nightzmora...
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Forget it. Get out there and back up our forces. We MUST stop the Radiant Knight and the Blood Knight.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Even if you have to kill them–
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: McKee.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: She holds up a ball of candlelight.
A beautiful, wispy glow.
Just leave them alone, won't you?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Teams 7 and 8 are in position.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: We've got a lot of witnesses, more every minute, but we have to do it anyway. Get ready to take the shot on the Grand Knights–
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: (Footsteps).
The onlookers, the knights, the Armorless Union, and the members of Pinus Sylvestris locked in combat, all stop what they were doing.
Like children witnessing the steel leviathan that is a train roar past for the first time.
...That's...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The 'Silverlance Pegasi!'
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The Armorless subconsciously stop their attack and lower their weapons.
Their breathing turns solemn, as if a single rash move would result in bloody retribution.
Margaret.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: That voice! Uncle Liam?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You've...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Even now, you intend to stay your path?
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Soldiers are a part of the country.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Soldiers carry out duty, not justice.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I've already told you this.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Indeed, I cannot lift an Infected through the entire city.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Heed my orders.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Escort the Radiant Knight and the Blood Knight to the Wall of Champions exhibition hall.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: A single road.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: So many people, so many events, all converging alongside you.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: How it reminds me of you, back in the day.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Report the Radiant Knight's current position.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Monique! Thank goodness, we finally got through to you––
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Hurry!
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Yes ma'am! They'll reach the Wall in about ten minutes–– a Silverlance Pegasus squad is escorting them. We can't make a move!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: I'll snipe her. I'll only get one shot at this.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Once my position is exposed... the Silverlance Pegasi can strike clear through a building.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: You must draw their attention.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Roger!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Madam Grand Knight.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oho, if it isn't little Amiya. Come here. Have you enjoyed your stay in Kazimierz?
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Mhm...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We managed to solve a lot of problems, all thanks to the Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Without Rhodes Island serving as mediators with the General Chamber of Commerce, the situation in Area 0 would not have been resolved peacefully. You have my thanks.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: It's what we do.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And you must be Dr. {@nickname}? Several companies suddenly started submitting applications regarding Area 0 to the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi, giving us ample 'grounds' to conduct an investigation.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Was this also your work?
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.options: I think we both did our parts.;I only did what I thought the Adeptus wanted us to do.;It's because we understand each other, right?

attributes.content: Did Gravel did a good job?
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Oh, of course!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She helped us a great deal!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then maybe it's time for her to leave the nest and hone her skills elsewhere.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: But that's a discussion for another day. As for these two Sarkaz... You go by Shining and Nightingale, right?
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: I'm listening.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: It's not often that Sarkaz visit these halls... Go meet the Radiant Knight. She needs people she can rely on.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Go.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: I see it.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: That golden, glistening exhibition hall.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Haha... In what kind of sport... does the winner and loser share the pedestal?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: The folks on the Board of Directors must be livid right now.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Maybe.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: If we...
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: —Watch out!
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: A lazurite bolt tears through the curtain of night.
In a flash, the tip is but hairs away from Margaret's face.
But––
What touches her first is a warm, gentle hand.
Did you need a hand, Nearl?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You... You're...
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: The breath of life permeates the space.
And the blue of his home, like a soaring fowlbeast, lands on the Sarkaz's shoulder.
Shining turns to face a certain direction, her lips curling up slightly.
...'The Fourth Arrow,' huh?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: That's too bad.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Sarkaz, what relationship do you have... with the Radiant Knight?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Companions.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Go, Nearl.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Welcome, Margaret, Dikaiopolis.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: ...The Grand Knight...
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: I've never seen this place... without flashing lights and a sea of reporters...
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: They didn't have the guts to push through the campaign knights to conduct their interviews.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Just for tonight... the Wall of Champions belongs only to the knights.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Never has that sounded more ironic.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: This exhibition hall predates the existence of the knight competitions. In the past, this place was a museum that preserved the relics of those heroes...
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: That was a long time ago.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: You still haven't changed your mind, right?
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret, you...
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Very well. Just like I couldn't convince your grandfather back then... Come, come closer, and let me have a look at you.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Kirill's granddaughter is all grown up now... It's uncanny how much you take after him. He... would've been proud.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: What you seek to do goes against the flow of the times, Margaret.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: You don't need the privilege of the military, of nobility, or of competitive fame.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: This is only your beginning, young lady. Even after all these twists and turns, you've only just begun your tumultuous journey.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: It's almost dawn.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell
